name: Shukaku
description: Shukaku, also known as the One-Tail, is a Tailed Beast with a single tail. It possesses the ability to control and manipulate sand, as well as use Wind Release techniques.

name: Matatabi
description: Matatabi, also known as the Two-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with two tails. It possesses the ability to generate and control blue fire, as well as exceptional speed.

name: Isobu
description: Isobu, also known as the Three-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with three tails. It possesses the ability to manipulate water and create coral structures.

name: Son Goku
description: Son Goku, also known as the Four-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with four tails. It possesses the ability to use Lava Release techniques and has incredible physical strength.

name: Kokuō
description: Kokuō, also known as the Five-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with five tails. It possesses the ability to use Boil Release, creating corrosive steam, as well as generating an illusionary mist.

name: Saiken
description: Saiken, also known as the Six-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with six tails. It possesses the ability to generate corrosive acid and has potent healing abilities.

name: Chōmei
description: Chōmei, also known as the Seven-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with seven tails. It possesses the ability to control insects and has the ability to fly.

name: Gyūki
description: Gyūki, also known as the Eight-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with eight tails. It possesses the ability to transform into a massive ox-like creature and has octopus-like tentacles.

name: Kurama
description: Kurama, also known as the Nine-Tails, is a Tailed Beast with nine tails. It possesses immense chakra and is one of the strongest among the Tailed Beasts. Kurama's chakra manifests as a fiery red color and grants its Jinchuuriki great power and vitality.

name: Ten-Tails
description: The Ten-Tails is the original Tailed Beast from which all other Tailed Beasts originated. It possesses immense power and is considered the most formidable of all the Tailed Beasts. The Ten-Tails has the ability to use a devastating attack known as the Tailed Beast Ball.
